title: Episode 147: Gwen Shamblin Lara and the Weigh Down Diet - Part 1
description:
CW: This episode contains discussions of weight loss methods and diet culture as well as brief mentions of child abuse. Listener discretion is advised.  
A self-described dumb blonde with a genuine heart for God, this registered dietician combined her love of the Lord with her professional training to craft her lightning rod hit weight loss program. But what started as a health venture morphed into a strict religious sect that concerned religious scholars and controlled its members’ everyday behaviors - sometimes with deadly consequences.

Please consider supporting the companies that support us!
-Athena Club - Show your skin you care with the Athena Club Razor Kit! Go to athenaclub.com and enter promo code SINISTER for 20% off your first order! 
-Smart and Sass - Smartass & Sass is a monthly subscription box that brings snark and sass right to your door. Go to smartassandsass.com and use code CREEPY for 25% off your first subscription!
-BetterHelp - Join the over 1,000,000 people who have taken charge of their mental health with the help of an experienced professional. Get 10% off your first month at betterhelp.com/SINISTER
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
